comments.body: Not a big fan of mixing multiline comments and code. And `a` should have double backticks since it is not a reference.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +895,899 @@If ``b = a[:100]`` is used instead, ``a`` is referenced by ``b`` and will persist in memory
even if ``del a`` is executed.
